page.title: 11FASHION IN BALMEDIE
page.content: In 1968 ladies wore short mini skirts. They were all the fashion in those days. The men seemed to like them but they must have been very draughty.Some ladies wore long dangling earrings (mainly red) Some men were hippies. They wore flared jeans and flared jumpers. On their feet they wore white socks and black gym shoes. Mods wore polo necked sweaters and suits. On their legs they wore jeans.In 1985 we wear thin drainpipe jeans grandad shirts, tank tops, ski-pants, staypress, little earrings and in 1968 the favourite pop-groups were the Beatles and the Wings. Today the favourite pop groups are Nik Kershaw, Frankie goes to Hollywood, Wham, and Dead and Alive.
